I think due to some complaint, Eureka management did do some adjustment.  The staff is friendly and offer the tester to me.

Maybe acai beach bowl should learnt from them ðŸ˜…. They only allow to use by purchase the most expensive item ðŸ¤”

I have tried Eureka popcorn before, and was planning to buy them as Christmas gifts for colleagues.

I visited Eureka Plaza Singapura on Sunday 10 December 2023, about 4:15PM. I would like to commend Sandy and her colleague (I cannot remember her name). I have always only liked the caramel flavour, but they were patient and enthusiastic about introducing me to the other flavours. Although I ended up only purchasing caramel flavour (again!), the vibe was friendly and I did not feel pressured at all.

Good service ethics.

The staff member at Eureka wearing a white top on May 19th provided exceptional customer service. He was friendly, knowledgeable, and incredibly helpful. His recommendations were impressive and greatly appreciated. I was thoroughly impressed with the overall experience though I didnâ€™t manage to purchase any popcorn.

I wished to give 0 star if I could. The promoter is very rude!
" You are Malaysian, but never eat our popcorn before"?
" You don't look like Singaporean"
"if you buy " cheap" item, you can't use voucher, only buy " expensive item can use". The term and condition of the Lazada voucher did not stated so!!! At the end, I walked away without buying anything. The management should really do something. All the review here is complaining the promoter.
I was served by Sandy Kang and Jing Yi . They asked me to try the sample . I tried salty egg popcorn . It was yummy . Sandy and Jing yo gives good and friendly service . Thank you !
